note:
I'm a 31 years old (and counting!) Queer & Nonbinary sociologist from Brazil. I've been sober for 11 years, and I am currently living with Schizophrenia, Anxiety, and OCD. #ActuallyAutistic.

I'm interested in social justice, history, DnD, videogames, movies, tv shows, music, and more!

Kindness, patience, and fairness are all very important to me, and my wish is to leave the world a better place than I found it. I'm a firm believer in the power of found family and community.
